projects.title: Kipher
projects.description: A multi-module cryptographic library for JVM applications that simplifies encryption/decryption using abstraction, with an automated CI/CD workflow for tests, builds, and publishing, streamlining the deployment process.

projects.title: ProCESO
projects.description: An AI-powered web platform to streamline and centralize community outreach management, such as faculty delegation, activity reporting, archiving, automated e-certificate generation and distribution, and AI-driven feedback analysis.
